title: Careers24 Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Careers24.com, South Africa's premier job portal. Search by keyword, location, sector, salary range, and remote preferences. Efficiently scrapes job details including titles, companies, descriptions, salaries, and more.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Careers24 search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/location/sector settings.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Search for specific job titles or keywords (e.g., 'Software Developer', 'Accountant', 'Nurse', 'Engineer').

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter by South African location (e.g., 'gauteng', 'western-cape', 'eastern-cape', 'kwazulu-natal'). Leave empty for all locations.

remoteOnly.title: Remote Jobs Only
remoteOnly.description: Set to true to show only remote job opportunities. Set to false to include remote jobs in results.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits each job detail page to extract full descriptions and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect. Set a lower number for faster results or higher for comprehensive searches.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to scrape. Prevents excessive crawling.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings for reliable scraping. Recommended to use Apify Proxy to avoid IP blocks.
